posts.title: Celebrate Pride with Short Story Collections by LGBTQ Authors
posts.text: For Pride Month, check out of these collections of short stories that show some of the many dimensions of LGBTQ life.

posts.title: Get Back Into Reading With Short Story Collections by Black Authors
posts.text: Do you like reading or are trying to get back into it, but don't have the time or focus for a long novel right now? Short stories may be just the cure for you.

posts.title: Wanderlust: Guidebooks to Get You Started Thinking About Travel Again
posts.text: Can't wait to travel but want to wait until it's safer to do so? There nothing wrong with researching beforehand, so you can be armed with the knowledge to travel safely.

posts.title: Books on the Philosophy and Practice of Stoicism
posts.text: Here are some books on learning the art of stoicism and focusing on what you control to help you through the mortal coil.

posts.title: Read the NAACP Literary Image Award Nominees
posts.text: Looking for a great read? Check out books nominated for an NAACP Image Award this year for fiction, nonfiction and debut author.

posts.title: Books for the Dapper Man
posts.text: Whether you're looking to reinvent yourself or never quite found a style that suits you, here is a short list of books to help inspire a style change or upgrade.

posts.title: Expand Your Air Fryer Repertoire With These Cookbooks
posts.text: If you're looking for some ideas on new dishes to make using your air fryer beyond your few go-tos, you're in luck!

posts.title: Care & Feeding: Books for New Plant Parents
posts.text: Congratulations! It's a...plant! Here's a list of books to help you get started caring for plants and helping them thrive.

posts.title: Books to Help You Fall into Decluttering
posts.text: Cluttered rooms can make a cluttered mind, so why not get some inspiration on home organization and decluttering.

posts.title: End National Ice Cream Month on a Sweet Note
posts.text: There is still enough time to get a cool recipe to make some sweet treats this summer.
